remarks: Covering property of the converse of the map defined by ~ df-mapd . (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2015.)
statement:
mapdcv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdcv.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdcv.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdcv.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdcv.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` U ) $.
mapdcv.d $e |- D = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdcv.e $e |- E = ( <oL ` D ) $.
mapdcv.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdcv.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
mapdcv.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
mapdcv $p |- ( ph -> ( X C Y <-> ( M ` X ) E ( M ` Y ) ) ) $.
